Qieyun: 見合一魂平?, 見合一魂上?
溪三虞平?, 影開一侯平?

English: all provinces and special administrative areas

Qieyun: 透開四添上?, 透開四添去?

English: to humbly receive a position; to be honored with employment
to support with the hand; to bear up; to carry on the shoulders

Qieyun: 心開三仙平?, 心開三仙上?, 心開三仙去?
心開三仙平?, 心開三仙上?, 心開三仙去?

English: followers of a military leader (during the Han dynasty 部 and 曲 were terms for small military units)
to lead by hand; to take with one
to be double or changeable. to have doubts
to disagree; to be out of accord with
to turn one's spear backward (to attack one's own men)

Qieyun: 幫四齊去?, 幫四先入?

English: rich; fertile。 to stir up; to excite
to punish; to exterminate. to ask for; to demand
to drive a chariot; to manage
not to be able to control the situation
to desist from exertions; to lose energy
to agree in; to be united in

Qieyun: 生開三支上?, 生開三支去?

English: to cast away old sandals; to renounce the empire
shut one's door and reflect on one's misdeeds

Qieyun: 並一豪平?, 並一豪去?
定開一唐入?, 澄開二庚入?, 以開三清入?

English: to follow; to proceed in order
